distribution.text: Copyright 2024 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for python-setuptools fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2024-6345: Fixed code execution via download functions in the package_index module (bsc#1228105)
notes.title: Description of the patch

relationships.relates_to_product_reference: SUSE Enterprise Storage 7.1

notes.text: A vulnerability in the package_index module of pypa/setuptools versions up to 69.1.1 allows for remote code execution via its download functions. These functions, which are used to download packages from URLs provided by users or retrieved from package index servers, are susceptible to code injection. If these functions are exposed to user-controlled inputs, such as package URLs, they can execute arbitrary commands on the system. The issue is fixed in version 70.0.
notes.title: CVE description
